spirit:field.spirit:name: major
spirit:field.spirit:description: Major version

spirit:field.spirit:name: minor
spirit:field.spirit:description: Minor version

spirit:field.spirit:name: patch
spirit:field.spirit:description: Patch version

spirit:field.spirit:name: prescaler
spirit:field.spirit:description: Prescaler reload value. The value defines the number of clocks in a quarter SCL period. E.g. for a 60MHz clock and a prescaler value of 15 a 1000 KHz SCL will be generated (60e6 * (1 / (15 * 4))).

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full status field. A 1 indicates an almost full or full FIFO. This bit is set when there are between fifo_af_lvl and fifo_depth number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty status field. A 1 indicates an almost empty or empty FIFO. This bit is set when there are between 0 and fifo_ae_lvl number of entries in the FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_full
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO full status field. A 1 indicates a full FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_empty
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO empty status field. A 1 indicates an empty FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aft
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_aet
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty threshold

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_depth
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO depth (always 1 byte wide)

spirit:field.spirit:name: error
spirit:field.spirit:description: Error status field. A 1 indicates that a transaction error occurred. This could be due to a NAK or a read from the bus when the FIFO is full. This bit is sticky until the clear field is asserted or a new transaction is started.

spirit:field.spirit:name: clock_stretch_active
spirit:field.spirit:description: This status field indicates whether the I2C master is currently being clock stretched (this requires clock_stretch_en to be 1)

spirit:field.spirit:name: force_sda_low
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write a 1 to force the SDA line to 0. Clear this field for normal behaviour.

spirit:field.spirit:name: slave_addr
spirit:field.spirit:description: I2C slave address

spirit:field.spirit:name: read_byte_count
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write the number of bytes that should be read from the I2C device before ending the transaction. The value should not be bigger than the FIFO depth.

spirit:field.spirit:name: clear
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write a 1 to clear the I2C master. This clears the FIFO and resets the state machine. The clear bit must be asserted for at least 2 PCLK cycles. HW does NOT clear this field so SW should write a 0 to this field after it has written a 1 to clear the I2C master.

spirit:field.spirit:name: opmode
spirit:field.spirit:description: Mode of Operation: 2'b00 : I2C Read 2'b01 : I2C Write / SMBus Byte Write / SMBus Block Write 2'b10 : SMBus Byte Read 2'b11 : SMBus Block Read

spirit:field.spirit:name: clock_stretch_en
spirit:field.spirit:description: Clock stretch enable

spirit:field.spirit:name: go
spirit:field.spirit:description: Write a 1 to initiate an I2C transaction. HW will clear this field upon completion and also generates an interrupt. A new transaction should not be attempted until this field returns a 0, indicating it is not busy.

spirit:field.spirit:name: wr_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Byte to write into the I2C master FIFO.

spirit:field.spirit:name: rd_data
spirit:field.spirit:description: Byte to read from the I2C master FIFO.

spirit:register.spirit:name: enable
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Enable register - Write 1 to enable, 0 to mask an interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost empty NOTE: If the FIFO is empty when this interrupt is enabled, it will cause an interrupt right away!

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Transfer done

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending
spirit:register.spirit:description: Pending register - This indicates which events are pending, Write 1 to clear

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High FIFO almost empty NOTE: If the FIFO is empty, this event is pending and if enabled will cause an interrupt!

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active High Transfer done

spirit:register.spirit:name: pending_irq
spirit:register.spirit:description: Interrupt Pending register - This indicates which pending events are enabled to cause an interrupt

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active High FIFO almost empty

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Level-triggered - Active-High FIFO almost full

spirit:field.spirit:name: done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Edge-triggered - Active High Transfer done

spirit:register.spirit:name: raw
spirit:register.spirit:description: This register contains the registered state of interrupt signals

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_ae
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the FIFO almost empty flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: fifo_af
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the FIFO almost full flag (Active-High)

spirit:field.spirit:name: done
spirit:field.spirit:description: Current state of the transfer done flag (Active-High)

variant.name: none
variant.doc: 'none' variant states including all templates which are not assigned any variant property.
